duties_responsibilities.duty: Remove grease, dirt, paint, or rust from vehicle surfaces using abrasives, solvents, brushes, blowtorches, washing tanks, or sandblasters.
Assist painter in pre-paint blending needs.
Work with paint team to keep vehicle on track for scheduled delivery time.
Fill small dents or scratches with body fillers and smooth surfaces to prepare vehicles for painting.
Buff and wax the finished paintwork.
Disassemble, clean, and reassemble sprayers and power equipment using solvents, wire brushes, and cloths for cleaning duties.

education_certification.credential: Prior experience in vehicle paint process.
